content.raw: I notice that with the keyboard teleop, if I send a walk command (e.g. with "i"-key), then interrupt the walking command by pressing the "k"-key before trajectory ends, the robot appears to drifts slowly for a little while before coming to a full stop.
content.html: I notice that with the keyboard teleop, if I send a walk command (e.g. with "i"-key), then interrupt the walking command by pressing the "k"-key before trajectory ends, the robot appears to drifts slowly for a little while before coming to a full stop.
